item.description:
Anyone interested in playing 18 holes at Campbell's Scottish Highlands on Saturday? I booked two tee times beginning at 11:40am. Easy to get to off Rte 93 just over the border in Salem, NH. People seem to enjoy this one every time we play it. Only about 40-45 mins from Boston. Pleasant, somewhat links-style course with casual clubhouse. $66 greens fee includes cart.

http://www.scottishhighlandsgolf.com/

As always, please try to be checked in 15-20 minutes early so we can organize ourselves. We usually gather just outside the clubhouse or at the first tee. Of course, also try to remember to give me a dollar at the start so we can help reimburse Amy for this year's Meetup license. Thanks much!

How the Waiting List Works:

Folks on the waiting list receive an email whenever a spot opens up. The first to respond moves from the waiting list into the open slot.  If there are people on the waiting list soon after the event posting, I'll often try to add another tee time. For this event, however, the course doesn't have the third sequential tee time available.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Campbell's Scottish Highlands - Sat 5/19
